channel.title: Crashed to desktop when killed in fight with Osprey
channel.description: I've experienced several crashes in the Parking lot where you fight the Osprey. BM crashed to desktop every single time I was killed while taking cover behind the red container. I tested the issue on another PC and it also crashed in the same spot. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T6_46_14C0.mdmp (99.7 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T6_44_9C0.mdmp (97.1 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_16T4_31_46C0.mdmp (98.2 KB)
